# EMRRtools

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of EMRRtools is to provide commonly-used R functions to be used on work related to DWR's Ecosystem Monitoring, Research, and Reporting (EMRR) Branch.

## Installation

You can install the development version of EMRRtools from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("EMRR-DISE/EMRRtools")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(EMRRtools)
## basic example code
```
